column5: Is the Tánaiste aware of the recommendation from the HSE to amalgamate two call centres following a review of the out-of-hours GP service?  If she is aware of it, what is the Government's plan?  Does it intend to close the centre in Galway or Letterkenny?  That is the choice on the Tánaiste's desk.  Does she intend to follow through on that recommendation?  It is important that we know of the plans for it.

I was going to raise this issue under the Health Information Bill but after listening to some comments this morning and given the lack of information which we were getting from parliamentary questions——

——-the new Whip, Deputy Curran, should perhaps rename it the lack of information Bill because trying to get information from the HSE at the moment is a scandal.  Stalinist Russia would not have a look-in.
